modName: Mountain Mansion - with pool and sauna
summary: This is a medium sized home near Markarth, on the outside it looks small but the house in built into the mountains
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=6]Mountain Mansion[/size]
[/u][/b][b]Hello, this is my first skyrim mod, it is a medium sized home located south of Markarth, it has a small exterior but don't let that fool you, it has everything you need inside.[/b]

[u]Features:[/u]
[size=3]Big Pool.[/size]
[size=3]Sauna.[/size]
[size=3]Hot tub in master bedroom.[/size]
[size=3]Alchemy table.[/size]
[size=3]Enchanting table.[/size]
[size=3]Cooking.[/size]
[size=3]A armory where you can show off your armor and weapons.[/size]
[size=3]A working Area with everything you need such as smelter and grindstone etc.[/size]
[size=3]Bedroom for followers with 4 beds.[/size]

[size=6][b][u]You need all three dlcs for this mod to work
[/u][/b][/size]
[size=4][b][u]I recommend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045/?]My home is your home[/url] mod to get your followers to live in Mountain mansion.

I recommend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11370/?]Spouses can live everywhere[/url] mod to get your spouse to live with you in Mountain mansion.

In the screenshots i used [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]realvision enb[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D607%26preview%3D&pUp=1]2k textures[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2692/?]cinematic fire[/url].[/u][/b][/size]

[size=3]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]

[size=3]I will update the mod with new features such as - a stable, chests, childrens room.[/size]

[size=3]Please suggest any features you want to see in the house and i may add them.[/size]

[size=3]If you experience any bugs or see any misplaced things, please notify me.[/size]

[size=3]The mannequins may seem alive, if they do, just leave the house and then enter it again.[/size]
author: YoungaHenrik
